sentence_jp: 寸法図に従って段ボールに形状と折れ目の補助線を引く
sentence_en: Draw auxiliary lines of the shape and the fold on cardboard according to dimensional drawings.

sentence_jp: 折り目に切り込みを入れる
sentence_en: Cut along the auxiliary lines of the shape

sentence_jp: 端は接着のためにライナー残しにする
sentence_en: Leave the ends of the liner for gluing.

sentence_jp: 形状の線に沿ってカットする
sentence_en: Make incisions on the auxiliary lines of the fold.

sentence_jp: 補助線に従って折り曲げる
sentence_en: Fold along the incisions of the fold."

sentence_jp: ライナー部分で接着する
フタとソコの用紙をテープで段ボールに貼り付けて固定する
sentence_en: Tape a lid paper and a bottom paper to the cardboard to secure them in place.

sentence_jp: 折り目に切り込みを入れる
sentence_en: Cut along the auxiliary lines of the shape on the paper.

sentence_jp: 用紙の線に沿ってカットする
sentence_en: Make a cross-shaped incision in the lid.

sentence_jp: フタは十字の切り込みも入れるように注意
sentence_en: Make incisions on the auxiliary lines of the fold on the paper.
Fold along the incisions of the fold."

sentence_jp: フタの切り込み部分に割り箸を通して穴を広げる
sentence_en: Put chopsticks through the cutout in the lid to widen the hole.

sentence_jp: フタとソコを本体に被せるように接着する
sentence_en: Adhere the lid and the bottom with glue so that they cover the body.

sentence_jp: 割り箸を本体に入れる
